metadata.description: Manually labeled FinCEN documents for classifier evaluation

test_cases.title: FinCEN Notice on the Use of Convertible Virtual Currency Kiosks for Scam Payments and Other Illicit Activity
test_cases.rationale: Directly addresses crypto kiosks and illicit activity - critical for any crypto exchange's compliance program

test_cases.title: FinCEN Alert on Prevalent Virtual Currency Investment Scam Commonly Known as 'Pig Butchering'
test_cases.rationale: Pig butchering scams are a major crypto fraud vector - critical for exchange compliance teams

test_cases.title: FinCEN Alert on Fraud Schemes Involving Deepfake Media Targeting Financial Institutions
test_cases.rationale: Deepfakes affect KYC/identity verification - highly relevant but not crypto-specific

test_cases.title: FinCEN Extends Beneficial Ownership Information Reporting Deadline
test_cases.rationale: BOI reporting affects CDD programs but is entity-level compliance, not transaction monitoring

test_cases.title: FinCEN Alert to Financial Institutions to Counter Financing to Hamas and its Terrorist Activities
test_cases.rationale: Terrorist financing is core BSA concern - provides red flags for transaction monitoring

test_cases.title: FinCEN Alert to Financial Institutions to Counter Financing of Hizballah
test_cases.rationale: Terrorist financing alert with transaction red flags - high relevance for all FIs

test_cases.title: FinCEN Advisory on the Financing of ISIS and its Global Affiliates
test_cases.rationale: Detailed terrorist financing advisory - relevant for sanctions and AML programs

test_cases.title: FinCEN Advisory on Iranian Regime's Illicit Oil Smuggling and Shadow Banking
test_cases.rationale: Sanctions evasion via shadow banking - moderate relevance, more traditional banking focused

test_cases.title: Supplemental Advisory on Precursor Chemicals for Illicit Fentanyl Synthesis
test_cases.rationale: Drug trafficking financing is relevant but fentanyl precursor focus is specialized - low direct crypto relevance

test_cases.title: FinCEN Alert on Bulk Cash Smuggling by Mexico-Based TCOs
test_cases.rationale: Cash smuggling is relevant context but not directly applicable to crypto exchanges

test_cases.title: FinCEN Advisory on Chinese Money Laundering Networks Used by Mexican TCOs
test_cases.rationale: Chinese money laundering networks sometimes use crypto - moderate relevance with useful red flags

test_cases.title: FinCEN Alert on Fraud Schemes Abusing FinCEN's Name for Financial Gain
test_cases.rationale: Impersonation fraud affects customer protection - relevant for customer communications

test_cases.title: FinCEN Notice on Counterfeit U.S. Passport Cards for Identity Theft
test_cases.rationale: Identity document fraud directly impacts KYC processes at crypto exchanges

test_cases.title: FinCEN and BIS Notice on Global Evasion of U.S. Export Controls
test_cases.rationale: Export control evasion intersects with sanctions - relevant for transaction monitoring

test_cases.title: FinCEN Alert on COVID-19 Employee Retention Credit Fraud
test_cases.rationale: Tax credit fraud is tangentially relevant - proceeds may flow through crypto but not core focus

test_cases.title: FinCEN Notice on Payroll Tax Evasion and Workers' Compensation Fraud in Construction
test_cases.rationale: Industry-specific tax fraud with minimal relevance to crypto exchange operations

test_cases.title: FinCEN Alert on Fraud Rings Exploiting Federal Child Nutrition Programs in Minnesota
test_cases.rationale: Highly specific fraud scheme with minimal direct relevance to crypto - proceeds laundering possible

test_cases.title: FinCEN Notice on Financially Motivated Sextortion
test_cases.rationale: Sextortion often involves crypto payments - highly relevant with specific red flags

test_cases.title: FinCEN Alert on Cross-Border Funds Transfers Involving Illegal Aliens
test_cases.rationale: Immigration-related transfers may involve crypto but context is more traditional remittance

test_cases.title: Joint Notice on Timeshare Fraud Associated with Mexican TCOs
test_cases.rationale: Elder fraud scheme - proceeds may flow through crypto but scheme itself is traditional

test_cases.title: (Rescinded) FinCEN Alert on Israeli Extremist Violence in the West Bank
test_cases.rationale: Rescinded alert - should not inform current compliance decisions

test_cases.title: (Rescinded) FinCEN Alert on Israeli Extremist Settler Violence
test_cases.rationale: Rescinded alert - no longer valid guidance

test_cases.title: Supplemental Alert: FinCEN and BIS Urge Vigilance for Russian Export Control Evasion
test_cases.rationale: Russia sanctions evasion is relevant - crypto often used for sanctions circumvention

test_cases.title: FinCEN Alert on Oil Smuggling Schemes Associated with Mexican Cartels
test_cases.rationale: Oil smuggling financing context - TCO proceeds may touch crypto but not primary focus

test_cases.title: FinCEN Alert on Mail Theft-Related Check Fraud
test_cases.rationale: Check fraud is traditional banking - minimal relevance to crypto exchange operations
